definition: foreign (non-Chinese)/barbarian/classifier for occurrences (of an event, action or speech utterance)/classifier for iterations: times, -fold (as in twofold etc)/classifier for situations: kind, sort
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Azaleas and guavas are propagated by this method.
sentences.chinese: 杜鵑和番石榴都用這種方式繁殖。

sentences.english: We are picking guavas from the trees.
The introduction experiment of pearl variety of Psidium guajava was conducted in the subtropical area of Guizhou.
sentences.chinese: 在貴州亞熱帶地區對珍珠番石榴進行了引種試驗。

sentences.english: Lifted stone fruit and guava aromas combine with butterscotch of malolactic.
sentences.chinese: 核果和番石榴的芳香，與奶油糖果的果酸交織融合。

sentences.english: Guava is a kind of fruit of South American.
sentences.chinese: 番石榴是南美的一種水果。

sentences.english: Guava also rich in fiber which helps prevent constipation.
sentences.chinese: 番石榴還含有大量的纖維素，能防止便祕。

sentences.english: The clarification of guava juice by chitosan was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了殼聚糖對番石榴汁澄清效果。

sentences.english: If eaten regularly, guavas also lower your blood pressure .
sentences.chinese: 經常喫番石榴，也能降低你的血壓。

sentences.english: Objective To survey the in vitro antibacterial activity of the extract from Psidium guaijava L.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察番石榴葉提取物對常見細菌的抗菌作用。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the antidiarrheal mechanism of quercetin extracted from Psidium guajava L.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究番石榴葉提取物槲皮素止瀉的作用機制。

sentences.english: The chemical constituents and pharmacological effects of the leaves of Psidium guajava were reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 綜述番石榴葉化學成分和藥理活性的研究進展。

sentences.english: Refrigerationcould extend the storing period of guava fruit affective ly.
sentences.chinese: 冷藏可有效延長珍珠番石榴的貯藏期。

sentences.english: At the front counter, blocks of cheese and guavas sit in a glass case.
sentences.chinese: 在前臺，大塊的奶酪和番石榴放在玻璃瓶內。

definition: blue or green jujube/Chinese green date
red pitaya/dragon fruit/dragon pearl fruit (genus Hylocereus)
